Package wtomigraj

Package wtomigraj contains classes for communicating with server and clients.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Handler
    Deriving classes should handle incoming messages.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddrInfo
    Class AddrInfo keeps IP address and port in one object.
    Client
    Class designated for communication with server and other users.
    DatagramInfo
    DatagramInfo is used for extracting data from UDP packets which contain JSON string in their data field.
    Message
    Simple class for keeping a message content and its author.
    Receiver
    Class designated for listening on one DatagramSocket for incoming packets.
    ReqSender
    ReqSender is abbreviation for Request Sender.
    Utils
    Class contains few static methods of general purpose so they are used by many other methods in diffrent classes.
    Wtomigraj
    \"Wromigraj\" is an UDP server which arranges connection between clients.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Client.State
    Possible states of Client.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionException
    Exception for situations when data could not be send.
    InvalidDataException
    Exception for situations when received data is inconsistent with protocol.

Package wtomigraj Description

Package wtomigraj contains classes for communicating with server and clients. Class Wtomigraj is a server, it contains a main method so it can easly get started. Every game created with platform Wtomigraj should contain an instance of class Client. It ss designated to contact server and exchange data with other clients.
